description: Rear roof extension; rear outrigger roof extension
subdivision_of_building: First floor and loft floor level
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. |

The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: PN-001 REV R1: 3D - Exist. & Proposed; PN-002 REV R1: Block and Location Plan; PN-003 REV R1 : Site Plan; PN-004 REV R1: Existing Plans Ground & First Floor; PN-005 REV R1: Existing Plans Loft & Roof; PN-006 REV R1: Existing Elevations; PN-007 REV R1: Existing Sections; PN-008 REV R1: Proposed Plans Ground & First Floor; PN-009 REV R1: Proposed Plans Loft & Roof; PN-010 REV R1: Proposed Elevations; PN-011 REV R1: Proposed Sections; PN-012 REV R1: Shadow Cast Study; PN-014 REV R1: Proposed added volume; PN-002 REV R1: Block and Location plan; Location plan,
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings listed under condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
